cleaned_text: Dr. Santhosh John, BNYS, MD(Acu), Dip.Ayurveda & Panchakarma, DMT,PG Dip Recc., Consult is a Naturopath, independent researcher, speaker and author, duly registered with Board of Indian Medicine with Reg. No. 179/A. His focus of practice is Integrative Oncology. Currently, he is working with the Govt. of India as AYUSH Medical Officer. To treat Cancer, he integrates Naturopathy, Ayurveda, Yoga, Homoeopathy, Herbal Medicines and Supplements. The hypothesis of his treatment protocol is orally presented in the International Conference on Integrative Oncology - 2020, which can be viewed at his youtube channel [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2DOzbNSRfzQTc3XLvj8qEw](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2DOzbNSRfzQTc3XLvj8qEw). His article is published in reputed Traditional Medicine Research Journal. Those who wish to contact Dr. Santhosh John for Cancer treatment may drop an e-mail to [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#53372120323d273b3c203b393c3b3d132a323b3c3c7d303c7d3a3d) with subject line 'seeking treatment for Cancer'. Upon receiving your e-mail, a detailed consultation will be done online. Based on the consultation, a prescription detailing herbal medicines, naturopathic treatments and diet specifications will be sent to you. Most of the medicines can be purchased online. Treatments could be available with nearby Naturopathic practitioners.
